data.abstract: Existing tensor compilers have proven their effectiveness in deploying deep neural networks on general-purpose hardware like CPU and GPU, but optimizing for neural processing units (NPUs) is still challenging due to the heterogeneous compute units and complicated memory hierarchy.
data.container-title: Proceedings of the 42nd ACM SIGPLAN International Conference on Programming Language Design and Implementation
data.event: PLDI '21: 42nd ACM SIGPLAN International Conference on Programming Language Design and Implementation
data.title: AKG: automatic kernel generation for neural processing units using polyhedral transformations
